messages.message: Small point - when logged out and exploring a Marketplace app like a regular prospect, if I click on a Sample file, nothing happens. Only after a while I realized that I subsequently have to click on “run sample file”. Could we change that such that it runs when I click on the sample file? And maybe some language that tells me what to do (eg “click on sample file to see sample outputs”).
We’re working on changing the sample files to be more of a “View the results” of sample files.
the idea that we are doing a “sample” file run is a little devious since we already have the result pre-generated. We’re shifting to simply viewing the output of these files instead.
though, being able to just click on a sample file does have merit.

My question came up as we are exploring additional SEO we can do around these. One thing we’re exploring is to create a regular Wordpress page and have the sample file view in a iframe or otherwise. The objective would be to create something similar to this page https://nanonets.com/ocr-api/invoice-ocr (https://nanonets.com/ocr-api/invoice-ocr), which has a “try it now” if you scroll down a bit. 

What you are describing for the sample output, would that still work in this scenario? An alternative is to skip the iframe and simply mock it up in Wordpress design (ie fake it entirely).
I tend to imagine they will work in an iframe but I”ll have to get back to you on that
@Travis sounds like there could be a small polish task here around making clicking on a sample file actually take you to the sample results
seems like a reasonable usability improvement
Definitely. I’ll get it when I’m home.
